languages.text: "Кибелла подала хорошую идею. Кардинал подвернется сакральному истязанию по заветам Кровавой паутины. Ожидаю, что Его Преосвященство в процессе пересмотрит свои взгляды на смерть".
languages.translation_comment:
Запускается этюд VP_CardinalDeathCult
Дать Даргонусу дов+
Оставляем кардинала в живых — он уходит на свою личную "казнь"
Весы направо

Запускается этюд VP_CardinalDeathCult
Дать Даргонусу дов+
Оставляем кардинала в живых — он уходит на свою личную "казнь"
Весы направо

languages.text: "Kibellah has made a good suggestion. The cardinal shall undergo sacred torture in the established fashion of the Bloodspun Web. I expect he will reconsider his views on death in the process."
languages.original_text: "Кибелла подала хорошую идею. Кардинал подвернется сакральному истязанию по заветам Кровавой паутины. Ожидаю, что Его Преосвященство в процессе пересмотрит свои взгляды на смерть".

traits.locale_text: "Kibellah has made a good suggestion. The cardinal shall undergo a sacred torture in the established fashion of the Bloodspun Web. I expect His Holiness to reassess his views on death in the process."

"Kibellah has made a good suggestion. The cardinal shall undergo a sacred torture in the established fashion of the Bloodspun Web. I expect His Holiness to reassess his views on death in the process."

"Kibellah has made a good suggestion. The cardinal shall undergo sacred torture in the established fashion of the Bloodspun Web. I expect His Eminence will reconsider his views on death in the process."

"Kibellah has made a good suggestion. The cardinal shall undergo sacred torture in the established fashion of the Bloodspun Web. I expect His Eminence will reconsider his views on death in the process."
"Kibellah has made a good suggestion. The cardinal shall undergo sacred torture in the established fashion of the Bloodspun Web. I expect he will reconsider his views on death in the process."
"Kibellah has made a good suggestion. The cardinal shall undergo sacred torture in the established fashion of the Bloodspun Web. I expect he will reconsider his views on death in the process."

languages.text: "Kibellah hat einen guten Vorschlag gemacht. Der Kardinal wird sich einer heiligen Folter im Sinne des Blutgesponnenen Netzes unterziehen. Danach dürfte er etwas anders über den Tod denken."
languages.original_text: "Kibellah has made a good suggestion. The cardinal shall undergo sacred torture in the established fashion of the Bloodspun Web. I expect he will reconsider his views on death in the process."

traits.locale_text: "Kibellah hat einen guten Vorschlag gemacht. Der Kardinal wird sich einer heiligen Folter im Sinne des Blutgesponnenen Netzes unterziehen. Danach dürfte er etwas anders über den Tod denken."

"Kibellah hat einen guten Vorschlag gemacht. Der Kardinal wird sich einer heiligen Folter im Sinne des Blutgesponnenen Netzes unterziehen. Danach dürfte Seine Eminenz etwas anders über den Tod denken."

languages.text: « Je m'en remets à l'avis éclairé de Kibellah. Le cardinal sera soumis à la torture sacrée telle que pratiquée au sein de la Toile de Sang. J'ose espérer qu'il sera ainsi amené à reconsidérer son opinion sur la mort. »
languages.original_text: "Kibellah has made a good suggestion. The cardinal shall undergo sacred torture in the established fashion of the Bloodspun Web. I expect he will reconsider his views on death in the process."

traits.locale_text: « Je m'en remets à l'avis éclairé de Kibellah. Le cardinal sera soumis à la torture sacrée telle que pratiquée au sein de la Toile de Sang. J'ose espérer qu'il sera ainsi amené à reconsidérer son opinion sur la mort. »

« Je m'en remets à l'avis éclairé de Kibellah. Le cardinal sera soumis à la torture sacrée telle que pratiquée au sein de la Toile de Sang. J'ose espérer que Son Éminence sera ainsi amenée à reconsidérer son opinion sur la mort. »

languages.text: “绮贝菈的建议很中肯。红衣主教将会以织血罗网的方式接受神圣的痛苦。我希望，这个过程能帮助他重新认清看待死亡的方式。”
languages.original_text: "Kibellah has made a good suggestion. The cardinal shall undergo sacred torture in the established fashion of the Bloodspun Web. I expect he will reconsider his views on death in the process."

traits.locale_text: “绮贝菈的建议很中肯。红衣主教将会以织血罗网的方式接受神圣的痛苦。我希望，这个过程能帮助他重新认清看待死亡的方式。”
“绮贝菈的建议很中肯。红衣主教将会以织血罗网的方式接受神圣的痛苦。我希望，这个过程能帮助主教大人重新认清看待死亡的方式。”

languages.text: «Kibellah ha hecho una buena sugerencia. El cardenal se someterá a tortura sagrada con el método establecido por la Red Sanguinolenta. Confío en que reconsidere su opinión sobre la muerte en el proceso».
languages.original_text: "Kibellah has made a good suggestion. The cardinal shall undergo sacred torture in the established fashion of the Bloodspun Web. I expect he will reconsider his views on death in the process."

traits.locale_text: «Kibellah ha hecho una buena sugerencia. El cardenal se someterá a tortura sagrada con el método establecido por la Red Sanguinolenta. Confío en que reconsidere su opinión sobre la muerte en el proceso».

«Kibellah ha hecho una buena sugerencia. El cardenal se someterá a tortura sagrada con el método establecido por la Red Sanguinolenta. Confío en que Su Eminencia reconsidere su opinión sobre la muerte en el proceso».

languages.text: 「キベラは良い提案をした。枢機卿にはブラッドスパン・ウェブの定められた方式に従って聖なる拷問を受けてもらおう。その過程で、猊下も死に対する見解を見直すことになるだろう」
languages.original_text: "Kibellah has made a good suggestion. The cardinal shall undergo sacred torture in the established fashion of the Bloodspun Web. I expect His Eminence will reconsider his views on death in the process."

traits.locale_text: 「キベラは良い提案をした。枢機卿にはブラッドスパン・ウェブの定められた方式に従って聖なる拷問を受けてもらおう。その過程で、猊下も死に対する見解を見直すことになるだろう」

languages.text: "Kibellah'dan güzel bir öneri geldi. Kardinal, Kanipi Ağı usulünce kutsal işkenceye tabi tutulacak. Bu vesileyle ölüme dair görüşlerini de değiştireceği kanaatindeyim."
languages.original_text: "Kibellah has made a good suggestion. The cardinal shall undergo sacred torture in the established fashion of the Bloodspun Web. I expect he will reconsider his views on death in the process."

traits.locale_text: "Kibellah'dan güzel bir öneri geldi. Kardinal, Kanipi Ağı usulünce kutsal işkenceye tabi tutulacak. Bu vesileyle ölüme dair görüşlerini de değiştireceği kanaatindeyim."
"Kibellah'dan güzel bir öneri geldi. Kardinal, Kanipi Ağı usulünce kutsal işkenceye tabi tutulacak. Bu vesileyle Sayın Kardinal'in ölüme dair görüşlerini de değiştireceği kanaatindeyim."
